divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving East at 8:40-8:50, I spotted a star like figure in the sky. I stopped at the stop-sign and it started to move. Then, I thought it was an airplane. Until it stopped and stated to rotate at an intense speed. I was like" WHAT IS THAT!!!" I stopped and sat there watching it do this for about 30 more seconds. I got freaked out and turned right and when I looked back it was no longer there. I was so scared!!!
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Rogers
There were no other sightings in Rogers on or around May 22nd 2009
